title: Spectrum Watchface
summary: A fully customisable watchface with a gradient minute arc
description: The Spectrum Watchface combines innovative smartwatch technology with minimalist design. The face provides the time at a glance, and its colors are fully customizable. With a full range of colors, anything is possible. A slight transition from red to orange, perhaps, or a dramatic shift between aqua and red. Pair your watchface with the sunset, or make the arc completely white for a formal event. The Spectrum Watchface allows the user to adapt the design for any occasion.Customization Settings:- Select either the gear icon above the watchface when selected in the Android wear companion app, or the gear   icon on the physical device  which appears when changing watchfaces.  - The two gradient colors can be customized to any of Google's official Material Design '500' colors.Supported Android Wear Devices (Round Recommended): - LG G Watch- Gear Live- Motorola Moto 360- Sony SmartWatch 3- Asus ZenWatch- LG G Watch R- LG Urbane- Huawei Watch- Moto 360 2 (42mm/46mm)- Fossil Q - Tag Heuer Connected- Any Android Wear variation of the above
descriptionHTML:
The Spectrum Watchface combines innovative smartwatch technology with minimalist design. The face provides the time at a glance, and its colors are fully customizable.

With a full range of colors, anything is possible. A slight transition from red to orange, perhaps, or a dramatic shift between aqua and red. Pair your watchface with the sunset, or make the arc completely white for a formal event. The Spectrum Watchface allows the user to adapt the design for any occasion.

Customization Settings:
- Select either the gear icon above the watchface when selected in the Android wear companion app, or the gear icon on the physical device which appears when changing watchfaces.
- The two gradient colors can be customized to any of Google's official Material Design '500' colors.

Supported Android Wear Devices (Round Recommended):

- LG G Watch
- Gear Live
- Motorola Moto 360
- Sony SmartWatch 3
- Asus ZenWatch
- LG G Watch R
- LG Urbane
- Huawei Watch
- Moto 360 2 (42mm/46mm)
- Fossil Q
- Tag Heuer Connected
- Any Android Wear variation of the above
comments: Beautiful face I love this watch, it looks really nice! I like to pick a new colour scheme every day. Plenty of reuse, well worth the $1.50!
